segments.name: lineItemIdentifier
segments.description: This number is the same as the Line Item Number transmitted on the input Record SE40.

segments.name: countryOfOrigin
segments.description: The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) country code representing the country of origin. Valid ISO codes are listed in Appendix B of this publication.

segments.name: htsNumber
segments.description: A code located in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States Annotated (HTS) representing the tariff number.
